item.title: 索尼收购动漫出版商机遇大于风险
item.description: 索尼集团公司（Sony Group Corp. ）正在酝酿日本娱乐业历史上最大的收购案之一。但首先...【原文：Sony Group Corp. is flirting with one of the biggest takeovers in the history of Japan’s storied entertainment sector. But first...】

item.title: 美国 "临时工经济 "保持稳定，并未蓬勃发展
item.description: 我是塞西尔-道拉特（Cécile Daurat），美国经济学编辑。今天我们关注的是 "打工经济"。请将反馈和建议发送至 ecodaily@bloomberg.net，或通过 @economics 在 X 上与我们联系。如果您还没有注册，请点击这里。【原文：I’m Cécile Daurat, an economics editor in the US. And if you aren’t yet signed up to receive this newsletter, you can do so here.】

item.title: 特朗普对华关税威胁助推中国出口创新高
item.description: 美国当选总统唐纳德-特朗普威胁要对来自中国的所有商品征收 10%的额外关税，以惩罚中国没有兑现对芬太尼毒贩判处死刑的承诺。【原文：President-elect Donald Trump is threatening to impose 10% additional tariffs on all goods from China to punish the nation for not following through on promises to institute the death penalty for traffickers of fentanyl.】

item.title: VinFast亏损收窄，收入因电动汽车销量增加而跃升
item.description: VinFast 汽车有限公司称，由于交付了更多汽车，该公司第三季度亏损缩小，收入增加。【原文：VinFast Auto Ltd. said its third-quarter loss narrowed and revenue jumped as the company delivered more cars.】

item.title: 蓝天（Bluesky）称将遵守欧盟规则
item.description: 在欧盟指责快速增长的社交媒体平台藐视其数字法规后，Bluesky 表示正在努力遵守欧盟的规定。【原文：Bluesky said it’s working to comply with European Union rules after the bloc accused the fast-growing social media platform of flouting its digital regulations.】

item.title: OpenAI、Meta 和 Orange 用非洲语言训练人工智能模型
item.description: OpenAI 和 Meta Platforms 公司将开始用非洲语言训练人工智能程序，以解决非洲大陆数千种方言模型短缺的问题。【原文：OpenAI and Meta Platforms Inc. will begin training artificial intelligence programs on African languages, addressing a shortage of models for the continent’s thousands of dialects.】

item.title: 伊拉克、俄罗斯和沙特在欧佩克+会议前讨论能源市场问题
item.description: 来自伊拉克、俄罗斯和沙特阿拉伯（欧佩克+联盟中最大的三个国家）的官员在巴格达举行会议，讨论能源市场问题。【原文：Officials from Iraq, Russia and Saudi Arabia — three of the biggest nations in the OPEC+ alliance — met in Baghdad to discuss energy markets days before the group’s year-end gathering.】

item.title: 关税人 "卷土重来，成为推动全球市场的力量
item.description: 贝森特反弹 "并没有持续太久。就在市场欢呼特朗普的财政部长人选对华尔街有利，甚至有可能驯服苛刻关税威胁的一天之后，即将上任的总统提醒大家谁才是老大。特朗普认为有必要征收关税，以打击跨境流动的移民和非法毒品，市场反应迅速。加元跌至四年来的最低点。墨西哥比索跌至 2022 年以来最弱。【原文：The “Bessent Bounce” didn't last long. Just one day after markets cheered Trump’s pick for Treasury secretary as a Wall Street-friendly choice, someone that might even tame the threats of harsh tariffs — the incoming president reminded everyone who the boss is. Trump cast the tariffs as necessary to clamp down on migrants and illegal drugs flowing across borders, and the market reaction was swift. The Canadian dollar dropped to a four-year low. The Mexican peso sank to its weakest since 2022.Whi】

item.title: 韦丹塔计划向沙特铜矿项目投资 20 亿美元
item.description: 韦丹塔公司（Vedanta）将投资 20 亿美元在沙特阿拉伯建设铜加工设施，这将极大地推动沙特阿拉伯成为全球金属和矿业中心的雄心。【原文：Vedanta is set to invest $2 billion to build copper-processing facilities in Saudi Arabia, a significant boost for the kingdom’s ambitions to become a global metals and mining hub.】

item.title: 欧洲两家炼油厂开始建厂生产合成油
item.description: 道达尔能源公司（TotalEnergies SE）和 OMV 股份公司（OMV AG）即将启动利用废塑料制造合成油的工厂，以减少化学品生产过程中的排放。【原文：TotalEnergies SE and OMV AG are close to starting up plants that will make synthetic oil from waste plastic to cut emissions in the production of chemicals.】

item.title: 英国将考虑进一步放宽伦敦银行家奖金规定
item.description: 英国将考虑放弃对银行家奖金的更多限制，因为英国正在想方设法提高自己在全球金融舞台上的竞争力。【原文：The UK will consider ditching more restrictions on banker bonuses as the country looks for ways to become more competitive on the global financial stage.】

item.title: 视频游戏机制造商面对性能天花板
item.description: 人眼其实无法分辨 4K 和 8K 分辨率之间的差别。【原文：The human eye can’t really tell the difference between 4K and 8K resolution.】

item.title: 前中国银行董事长被判死刑，缓期执行
item.description: 中国以受贿罪判处中国银行股份有限公司前董事长刘连舸死刑，缓期执行。前中国银行董事长刘连舸因受贿罪被判处死缓，标志着对中国价值 66 万亿美元的金融业的审查力度加大。【原文：China handed a suspended death sentence to former Bank of China Ltd. Chairman Liu Liange over bribery, marking heightened scrutiny over the nation’s $66 trillion financial sector.】

item.title: 欧洲期货交易所计划在 2025 年推出欧盟债券期货
item.description: 欧洲期货交易所（Eurex Clearing AG）计划明年推出欧盟债务债券期货，与竞争对手洲际交易所（Intercontinental Exchange Inc.【原文：Eurex Clearing AG plans to launch bond futures for the European Union’s debt next year, joining its rival Intercontinental Exchange Inc. in the race to provide liquidity to what has become one of the region’s biggest issuers.】

item.title: 非洲顶级服装零售商反弹，计划推动增长
item.description: 非洲最大的服装零售商百福控股有限公司（Pepkor Holdings Ltd.）的股价攀升至三年来的最高点，原因是该公司宣布的股息超出了分析师的预期，而且该集团概述了一项扩张计划，其中包括多达 300 家新店。【原文：Pepkor Holdings Ltd. climbed to the highest in three years as Africa’s largest clothing retailer declared a dividend that beat analysts’ estimates and the group outlined a expansion plans that include as many as 300 new stores.】

item.title: 英国金融监管局将于 2026 年最终确定加密货币行业规则
item.description: 基尔-斯塔默（Keir Starmer）领导的英国政府正努力追赶竞争对手的金融中心，英国将于 2026 年公布一套最终确定的加密货币行业监管规则。【原文：The UK will publish a finalized set of rules for regulating the crypto industry in 2026, as Keir Starmer’s government seeks to catch up with rival financial centers.】

item.title: 埃克森公司表示，特朗普执政期间不太可能 "钻井、钻井、钻井"。
item.description: 埃克森美孚公司（Exxon Mobil Corp. ）上游总裁利亚姆-马伦（Liam Mallon）表示，尽管美国当选总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）呼吁 "钻井，宝贝，钻井"，但美国的石油和天然气生产商在未来几年不会大幅提高产量。【原文：Oil and gas producers in the US will not raise output significantly in the coming years despite calls from President-Elect Donald Trump to “drill, baby, drill,” said Exxon Mobil Corp.’s Upstream President Liam Mallon.】

item.title: 香港大亨郑氏珠宝在经济放缓中收入锐减
item.description: 中国最大的珠宝零售商周大福珠宝集团有限公司（Chow Tai Fook Jewellery Group Ltd.）在截至 9 月的半年内收入骤降 20.4%，创 2016 年以来最大降幅，原因是全球第二大经济体经济放缓，创纪录的高金价抑制了奢侈品消费。【原文：China’s largest jewelry retailer Chow Tai Fook Jewellery Group Ltd. saw revenue plunge 20.4% in the half year ended September, the biggest drop for the period since 2016 as the world’s No. 2 economy slows and record high gold prices dent luxury spending.】

item.title: 新研究显示：德国经济每年需要 28.8 万移民
item.description: 一项新的研究表明，德国经济每年将需要数十万移民，以抵消老龄化社会带来的负面影响。【原文：The German economy will need hundreds of thousands of immigrants a year to counter the negative impact from its aging society, according to a new study that feeds into an increasingly heated debate on the matter.】

item.title: 亿万富翁斯特纳德获准收购 Vista 户外弹药部门
item.description: 捷克亿万富翁米哈尔-斯特纳德（Michal Strnad）已获得 Vista Outdoor Inc.【原文：Czech billionaire Michal Strnad has won an approval from Vista Outdoor Inc. owners to buy the company’s ammunition unit for $2.2 billion, boosting the global footprint of his fast-growing arms business.】

item.title: 预算疑云未解，法国央行行长敦促明确预算
item.description: 法国央行行长弗朗索瓦-维勒鲁瓦-德-加尔豪（Francois Villeroy de Galhau）呼吁，在政府努力争取议会通过预算案之际，应更明确地制定修复国家财政的计划。【原文：France’s central bank governor, Francois Villeroy de Galhau, called for more certainty around plans to repair the country’s finances as the government struggles to get the budget through parliament.】

item.title: 英特尔先进工厂获得 79 亿美元美国芯片大奖
item.description: 拜登政府已敲定向英特尔公司（Intel Corp. ）提供近 79 亿美元联邦补助金的协议，这是一项旨在促进国内半导体制造业发展的计划所提供的最大一笔直接补贴。【原文：The Biden administration has finalized a deal to give Intel Corp. nearly $7.9 billion in federal grants, the largest direct subsidy from a program to boost domestic semiconductor manufacturing.】

item.title: 美联储会议纪要将提供官员削减幅度和速度的线索
item.description: 几位美联储官员已经表示，他们愿意在明年以更审慎的步伐降息，因为他们要应对共和党接管华盛顿、生产率回升和通胀改善放缓等不确定因素。【原文：Several Federal Reserve officials have signaled they’re open to cutting interest rates at a more deliberate pace next year as they grapple with the uncertainties of a Republican takeover in Washington, a pickup in productivity and slower improvement on inflation.】

item.title: 比特币反弹停滞，"超短头 "比特币 ETF 吸引创纪录资金流入
item.description: 一家基金为投资者提供了一种针对比特币的涡轮增压押注方式，该基金创下了最高日流入量，这表明一些投资者认为唐纳德-特朗普当选白宫所引发的涨势已经过头。【原文：A fund giving investors a way to turbocharge bets against Bitcoin notched its highest daily inflow in a sign that some investors consider the rally unleashed by Donald Trump’s election to the White House overdone.】

item.title: 特朗普最新关税威胁未提及地区，欧元上涨
item.description: 在欧洲躲过了唐纳德-特朗普最新一轮的贸易关税威胁后，欧元周二上涨，投资者也为欧元历史上最强劲的一个月做好了准备。【原文：The euro gained on Tuesday after Europe escaped the latest round of Donald Trump’s trade tariff threats and as investors positioned for what historically has been the strongest month for the currency.】

item.title: 英国自预算案以来首次通过银行出售债务筹集资金
item.description: 英国正在出售 2054 年到期的通胀挂钩债券，这是自上个月的预算案以来首次通过银行进行银团融资，以测试投资者的需求。【原文：The UK is selling an inflation-linked bond maturing in 2054, testing investor demand with its first syndication conducted through banks since last month’s budget.】

item.title: 麦格理因金属交易员记录虚假交易被英国罚款
item.description: 麦格理银行有限公司（Macquarie Bank Ltd.）英国分行被英国当局罚款 1300 万英镑（约合 1630 万美元），原因是该公司金属部的一名伦敦交易员在近两年的时间里通过虚构交易来掩盖损失。【原文：UK authorities fined Macquarie Bank Ltd.’s British unit £13 million ($16.3 million) after a London trader on the firm’s metals desk was able to book fictitious trades to conceal their losses for almost two years.】

item.title: 2024 年的股票波动率五年来从未如此之低
item.description: 紧张的美国总统大选、中东和乌克兰战争、欧洲政府分崩离析：尽管风险事件纷至沓来，但股票波动率正朝着2019年以来最低的年均值迈进。【原文：A tense US presidential election, wars in the Middle East and Ukraine, European governments falling apart: Despite a flurry of risk events, equity volatility is heading for its lowest annual average since 2019.】

item.title: 德意志银行的查德哈将 S&P 500 指数的目标定为 7,000 点，因为经济正在崛起
item.description: 德意志银行（Deutsche Bank AG）的班基姆-查达（Bankim Chadha）认为，到明年年底，S&P 500 指数将达到 7000 点，这使他成为华尔街策略师中预测美股将进一步上涨的最乐观者。【原文：The S&P 500 will hit 7,000 points by the end of next year, according to Deutsche Bank AG’s Bankim Chadha, making him the most optimistic among Wall Street strategists predicting further gains for US stocks.】

item.title: 匈牙利欧尔班将在数日内选出新的中央银行行长
item.description: 匈牙利总理维克托-欧尔班（Viktor Orban）可能会在几天内宣布他对央行行长和经济沙皇的人选，据一位高级部长透露，财政部长米哈里-瓦尔加（Mihaly Varga）是负责货币政策的最热门人选。【原文：Hungarian Prime Minister Viktor Orban may announce his choices for central bank governor and a powerful economy czar in days, according to a senior minister, with finance chief Mihaly Varga the front-runner to take charge of monetary policy.】
